Race.SpecificTitle: Water & Sewer Comm. No. 1 -- 8 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
WATER AND SEWER COMMISSION NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 8 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SEWERS AND SEWERAGE DISPOSAL WORKS, INCLUDING THE PAYMENT OF PRINCIPAL AND INTEREST ON ANY DEBT OBLIGATIONS PREVIOUSLY ISSUED BY SEWERAGE DISTRICT NO. 1 OF THE PARISH OF ST. MARTIN OR HEREAFTER ISSUED BY THE COMMISSION TO CONSTRUCT, ACQUIRE AND IMPROVE SEWERS AND SEWERAGE DISPOSAL WORKS.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Martin Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "Commission") levy an eight (8) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the jurisdiction and territorial limits of the Commission, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating sewers and sewerage disposal works, including the payment of principal and interest on any debt obligations previously issued by Sewerage District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Martin or hereafter issued by the Commission to construct, acquire and improve sewers and sewerage disposal works?
